body.name: Coleshome L Shaped Gaming Desk with LED Lights & Power Outlets, Reversible 56" Computer Desk with Full Monitor Stand & Storage Shelves, Ergonomic Home Office Corner Desk, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 53 mins
features: 【Power Outlets & USB Charging Ports】This l shaped computer desk is equipped with 3 Standard Outlets & 2 USB Ports, which make it easy to charge your printer, scanner, laptop, phone, gaming devices and other office equipment. You don't need to switch between plugging your phone, headset or player into your computer anymore. Providing great convenience for your work and entertainment.

【Cool Lighting Effects】This gaming desk features LED lighting with 7 colors, 13 lighting modes, 8 adjustable brightness levels and 9 flicker frequencies to create an immersive and cool gaming atmosphere while illuminating your desktop at night. It has a memory function that keeps the LED light in the last mode when turned on. You can adjust the color and mode of the light strip as you want and start gaming!

【Double Shelves Design】 This multi-purpose modern desk has two-tier shelves on both sides, so you can place not only dual computer hosts but also your headphones and other devices. Freeing up space, keeping your desk clean and tidy. This reversible l desk can be installed in both the left and right corners.

【Abundant Storage Capacity】The dimensions of this corner desk: 55.9" (L) x 55.9" (W) x 18.9" (D) x 35" (H).This gaming l desk comes with a full monitor stand, which is long and wide enough to provide a spacious top surface for multiple monitors. Giving you plenty of room to store your items. This ergonomically designed desk elevates your line of sight, allowing you to maintain proper sitting posture and avoid the discomfort caused by poor sitting posture.

【Easy to Assemble】This home office desk consists of a sturdy solid desk board and steel frame. Adjustable leg pads keep the l shape table stable on uneven floors. Using detailed installation instructions and assembly tools, it is easy to install the desk. If you have any problems, please feel free to contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed
reviews.reviewText: I went from using this as a gaming desk to a desk for my workspace, and it's fantastic! Very sturdy, was easy to put together, and very spacious.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly easy to put together and looks great!
reviews.reviewText: We found an almost identical deak at a big box store for $100+ more than this one. I was hesitant to order online because we seem to always have issues with missing or mislabeled parts. This desk is perfect. The instructions were well written and clear, the pieces were all well packed and labeled so they were easy to identify, and the company provided plenty of extra hardware just in case. I would definitely order from them again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value - excellent engineering - easy assembly
reviews.reviewText: High quality everywhere!Assembly will take a couple hours, but almost impossible to mess up. Instructions are best I’ve ever seen. Spare fasteners. Every component is perfectly finished. You can tell that I’m impressed. (Because I’m an engineer myself? Probably!)This desk is the centerpiece of my multi-monitor office. Occasionally as gamer.

reviews.reviewerName: Brofessor Matt Matterson, Masters in Himbology, Bachelor's Degree in Bromance
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble, easy to love, though the surface is very sensitive to oils.
reviews.reviewText: I needed a new desk and this one measured up. I love the outlets, and the overall shape. However, I didn't measure it well in my mind, and it has a few less than ideal aspects that remind you of the price discount.First off, the adhesives for the light strips melted in transit, with two of the clips shattering as well. The strips have let the lights fall off already, and will need replacement.Secondly, the Carbon Fiber surface is incredibly sensitive to the oils of skin, leaving parts looking wet and stained after casual use. It cleans off, but comes back with each use.The last negative is my fault, for not really thinking, but the available desk space feels smaller than normal due to the shelf on top. The legs are spaced in such a way that you really only have about 11 inches of visible desk before the shelf obscures vision and the legs begin to limit the area. Had I really understood this, I might have chosen one a bit bigger.However, it is sleep, sturdy, cheap, stylish to a degree, and it holds my computer stuff. I easily assembled it alone, though they included a second Alan wrench should you have a partner to help with some of the tedious bits. All in all, it took maybe an hour and a half, and I love it for what it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I work from home and needed more work space. Hubby bought this desk for me and it is amazing! The light up under desk area is super convenient. Very roomy, lots of are for leg room under the desk. It could have a few drawers but that is my only issue with it. I highly recommend this desk!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ideal Gaming Desk
reviews.reviewText: The desk really saves up room. I love that there are plugs and usb included in the desk. My pc tower fits perfectly. It was pretty easy to set up. It was heavy for me personally, and at times when building I did need an extra hand but that’s just me. The lights work great. I really hope this lasts me years ahead because it’s truly a great buy. Thank you!

reviews.reviewText: My desk is more organize and it looks great, perfect for gaming of office room
